'''1.0.9''' is a [[launcher]] version released on July 10, 2013.

== Additions ==
* Added support for the new crash-reporting system, [https://minecrafthopper.net/ Hopper].
** Any client crash will automatically submit the crash report

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-862}} – Client token collisions can prevent players from logging in to servers
